statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 4 \\ -14 \\ -12 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 14 \\ -10 \\ 29 \\ 26 \\ -20 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ 2 \\ 8 \\ 11 \\ -12 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
